title: Backend Developer - Python/Node.js
description:
**Software Engineer (Backend)**
**About The Role**
 Looking for a hands\\-on Backend Developer who has independently built and shipped core features using Node.js/Python and SQL databases. The role demands ownership of end\\-to\\-end delivery, from understanding business use cases to deploying and maintaining stable backend services.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Own features end\\-to\\-end : requirements, design, implementation, testing, deployment, and monitoring.
* Work on complex functionalities, not just minor bug fixes or cosmetic changes.
* Design efficient SQL schemas, write optimized queries, and ensure data integrity.
* Collaborate closely with frontend and product teams to ship complete, user\\-facing features.
* Participate in code reviews, improve code quality, and maintain high engineering standards.
* Troubleshoot production issues and drive root\\-cause fixes with a big\\-picture view of the system.


**Must\\-Have Skills \\& Profile**
* 1 to 2 years of experience as a backend developer.
* Strong in Node.js, TypeScript/JavaScript, and SQL (MySQL or similar RDBMS) SQL is mandatory.
* Proven track record of independently building and owning features or modules in production systems.
* Strong grasp of web fundamentals : HTTP, REST APIs, authentication, request\\-response lifecycle.
* Experience working on Linux\\-based environments and Git/GitHub workflows.
* Awareness of how their module fits into the larger product architecture and business goals.


**Bonus / Brownie Points**
* Strong open\\-source contributions (GitHub links), especially to web/backend projects.
* Participation in GSoC, hackathons, Codeforces/competitive programming, or similar platforms.
* Internships at strong or reputed product/tech companies with real feature ownership.
* Experience integrating with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP) and basic DevOps exposure.


**What We Do Not Want**
* Primarily ML/AI profiles or candidates whose main work is in data science/ML pipelines.
* Candidates whose experience is limited to minor bug fixes, CSS tweaks, or small refactors with no major feature ownership.

title: Backend Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 GEDU Global Education is a leading organization dedicated to transforming the landscape of education through innovative technology solutions. Committed to fostering academic excellence and accessible learning, GEDU leverages cutting\\-edge advancements in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and digital platforms to create impactful educational tools and services. Our mission is to empower learners worldwide by providing personalized, engaging, and effective educational experiences. With a strong focus on research and development, GEDU continuously explores new technological horizons to enhance educational delivery and outcomes, making us a pioneer in the EdTech industry.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Software Engineer specialized in AI/ML and automation technologies to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in designing, developing, and deploying intelligent software solutions that enhance our educational platforms. Your expertise will contribute to building sophisticated chatbots, natural language processing tools, and AI\\-driven applications that support personalized learning experiences. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams, including product managers, data scientists, and UI/UX designers, to translate innovative ideas into scalable, high\\-quality software products. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, AI/ML frameworks, and cloud\\-based solutions, with a passion for leveraging technology to revolutionize education.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a bachelor's degree in computer engineering, computer science, or a related field. A minimum of 5 to 10 years of professional experience in web application development is required, with at least 2 to 3 years dedicated to AI/ML and automation technologies. Proficiency in technologies such as Microsoft ASP.Net, ASP.NET MVC, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, React, and Entity Framework is essential. Additionally, experience with programming languages like Python and C\\# is necessary. Candidates should have a solid understanding of chatbot architecture, particularly based on the Microsoft Bot Framework, and possess knowledge of machine learning, artificial intelligence, and natural language processing techniques. Familiarity with integrating chatbots with messaging platforms such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Microsoft Teams, or Telegram is highly desirable. Hands\\-on experience with deep learning frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow, as well as working knowledge of large language models (LLMs), will be advantageous. Candidates should also be familiar with cloud services like Microsoft Azure and AWS, containerization tools such as Docker and Kubernetes, and database systems including SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and optionally MongoDB. Strong communication skills, agile methodology experience, and a proactive learning attitude are essential for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Key Responsibilities:**
* Highly motivated individual who can deliver high\\-quality software solutions.
* Oversee the entire software development lifecycle, from planning and design to implementation, testing, and deployment.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements, define project scope, and create detailed project plans.
* Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
* Conduct regular team meetings, code reviews, and performance evaluations.
* Identify and address technical and operational challenges to maintain project momentum.
* Foster a positive team environment, encouraging collaboration and professional growth.


**Additional Responsibilities**
* Design and develop AI\\-powered applications, including chatbots and NLP tools.
* Implement and optimize machine learning models and deep learning techniques.
* Integrate AI solutions with various messaging platforms and cloud services.
* Develop and maintain RESTful APIs and ensure seamless database connectivity.
* Participate in code reviews, refactoring, and adherence to best industry practices.
* Stay updated with emerging trends in AI, machine learning, and software development.
* Work within an agile environment, contributing to sprint planning and retrospectives.


**Benefits**
 At GEDU Global Education, we believe in supporting our employees through a comprehensive benefits package that fosters professional growth and personal well\\-being. Our offerings include competitive salary packages, health insurance, and wellness programs. Employees have access to ongoing training and development opportunities, including certifications and workshops in the latest AI and software technologies. We promote a flexible work environment that encourages innovation and work\\-life balance. Additionally, our company culture emphasizes collaboration, diversity, and inclusion, ensuring a supportive atmosphere where every team member can thrive. Opportunities for career advancement and participation in groundbreaking projects are integral parts of working with us.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 GEDU Global Education is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and applicants. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. Our hiring practices are designed to promote diversity and ensure fair treatment for all candidates. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our innovation and success, and we are dedicated to fostering a culture of respect, equality, and opportunity for everyone.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer - Software Testing
description:
**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scenarios for new features and existing functionalities across front\\-end, back\\-end, API, and database layers.
* Perform thorough end\\-to\\-end software testing, including functional, integration, regression, and user acceptance testing (UAT).
* Identify, document, prioritize, and track bugs and issues using defect tracking systems, collaborating closely with development teams for timely resolution.
* Generate detailed test reports, providing clear insights into testing progress, results, and overall product quality.
* Taking ownership of technical issues, and working with development team to resolve more advanced issues when necessary
* Actively participate in the entire Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Test Life Cycle (STLC), contributing to quality gates at every stage.
* Continuously improve testing processes and methodologies to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.


**Required Skills**
* Strong proficiency in Test Case Design and Execution, with an ability to create robust and effective test plans.
* Expertise in Bug Reporting and Tracking, utilizing tools such as Jira or similar platforms for efficient defect management.
* Solid understanding of Test Automation concepts, with practical exposure to frameworks like Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright being a significant advantage.
* Basic Programming/Scripting Skills in languages such as Python, Java, or JavaScript for test automation purposes.
* Exceptional Attention to Detail, ensuring no defect goes unnoticed.
* Excellent Problem\\-Solving Skills, capable of diagnosing complex issues and suggesting effective solutions.
* Strong Communication Skills, both written and verbal, for effective collaboration with cross\\-functional teams.
* Thorough Understanding of SDLC and STLC principles and methodologies.
* Experience with API Testing using tools like Postman, SoapUI, or similar.
* Proficiency in Database Testing, including writing SQL queries to validate data integrity and consistency.


**Experience**
* A minimum of 4 years of hands\\-on experience in testing B2B software applications.
* Proven exposure to end\\-to\\-end software testing across all layers, including front\\-end, back\\-end, APIs, database, and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
* Demonstrated familiarity with generating comprehensive test plans, detailed test cases, effective test scenarios, and clear test reports.
* Practical exposure to manual testing tools such as Jira, Postman, and other similar platforms.
* Extensive experience testing complex B2X (Business\\-to\\-Business, Business\\-to\\-Consumer, etc.) applications.
* Mandatory experience with mobile application testing.
* Previous exposure to automation testing methodologies and tools is highly valued, though not necessarily a primary skill for this role.

title: Software Engineer - Backend Technologies
description:
**Description**
 About the Role :
   

  

 We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Developer with strong expertise in Node.js, TypeScript, and Azure Cloud. The ideal candidate should have hands\\-on experience in designing scalable backend systems, optimizing performance, building integrations, and ensuring production stability. This is an individual contributor role requiring excellent problem\\-solving skills, ownership, and the ability to lead technical discussions.
   

  

**Must\\-Have Skills**
 Backend Development :
   

  

* Strong expertise in Node.js \\& TypeScript with frameworks like Express or NestJS.
* Deep understanding of REST API architecture, microservices, and backend design patterns.


**Database \\& Caching**
 Hands\\-on experience with SQL Server / MySQL including :
   

  

* Query optimization
* Indexing
* Schema design
* Resolving database bottlenecks
* Practical experience with Redis caching (TTL, eviction policies, clustering) to reduce DB load.


**Azure Cloud Expertise**
 Strong working knowledge of :
   

  

* Azure Functions
* Azure App Services
* API Management
* Azure SQL
* Azure Redis Cache
* CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps)


**Asynchronous Systems \\& Integrations**
* Experience building async workflows using Azure Service Bus / RabbitMQ / Kafka.
* Ability to design incremental data sync, webhook\\-based updates, and reliable integration flows.


**Security \\& Authentication**
 Strong understanding of :
   

  

* JWT, OAuth2
* MFA/TOTP
* RBAC
* Secure token flows and best practices


**Performance, Monitoring \\& Production Maturity**
 Experience optimizing backend systems for :
   

  

* Lower latency
* Higher throughput
* Debugging slow queries
* Strong skills in production issue RCA, monitoring, logging, and stability engineering.
* Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well\\-structured code.


**Good\\-to\\-Have Skills**
* Experience refactoring monolithic applications into microservices.
* Knowledge of Azure Synapse, Data Factory, Data Lake for analytics/data offloading.
* Experience with event\\-driven architecture and distributed systems.
* Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and modern DevOps workflows.
* Exposure to VAPT, OWASP, and cloud security best practices.
* Experience integrating with third\\-party systems like ERP platforms (e.g., Oracle NetSuite), webhook systems, or custom connectors.
* Understanding of ETL/ELT pipelines, batch jobs, data orchestration.
* Experience mentoring junior developers or leading small engineering pods.


**Key Qualities Were Looking For**
* Strong ownership and ability to work independently.
* Excellent debugging and problem\\-solving skills.
* Ability to communicate effectively with internal teams.
* Passion for clean code and scalable architecture.

title: Interesting Job Opportunity: mple.ai - Full Stack Developer - Python/MERN Stack
description:
**Description**
 Mple.ai is an AI\\-powered training platform for enterprises, designed to deliver scalable, measurable, and impactful training through role\\-plays and AI\\-driven evaluations. Our platform allows enterprises to create custom simulations or use pre\\-built templates, making training more relevant, effective, and impactful. With mple.ai, companies streamline training, improve communication, and empower teams to sell smarter and faster.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are seeking an experienced and driven Software Engineer with 5 years of full\\-stack development experience (MERN \\+ Python) and a proven ability to lead small, agile teams. Youll take end\\-to\\-end ownership of product development from architecture and design to delivery and deployment while mentoring engineers and driving technical excellence. This is a hands\\-on leadership role, ideal for someone who thrives in a fast\\-paced, startup environment and enjoys solving complex problems with clean, scalable solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Technical Leadership : Lead and mentor a team of developers, ensuring best practices in design, architecture, and coding standards.
* End\\-to\\-End Development Ownership : Oversee full lifecycle of product development architecture, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
* Hands\\-On Development : Contribute directly to the codebase using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Python (Flask or FastAPI).
* System Architecture \\& Scalability : Design and optimize system architecture for high performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration : Work closely with founders, product managers, and designers to translate business needs into technical solutions.
* Process \\& Quality Management : Drive code reviews, CI/CD practices, documentation, and ensure clean, maintainable code.

title: Staff Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Inovalon was founded in 1998 on the belief that technology, and data specifically, would empower the transformation of the entire healthcare ecosystem for the better, improving both outcomes and economics. At Inovalon, we believe that when our customers are successful in their missions, healthcare improves. Therefore, we focus on empowering them with data\\-driven solutions. And the momentum is building.
   

  

 Together, as ONE Inovalon, we are a united force delivering solutions that address healthcare‚Äôs greatest needs. Through our mission\\-based culture of inclusion and innovation, our organization brings value not just to our customers, but to the millions of patients and members they serve.
   

  

**Overview:** 
 The Staff Software QA Engineer works with all service aspects of high throughput and multi\\-tenant services, has the ability to design components carefully, properly handle errors, write clean and well\\-factored code with good tests and good maintainability.
   

  

 Duties and Responsibilities:
   

  

* Collaborate with global, cross\\-functional teams to design, build, and operate innovative platforms ensuring quality across the SDLC.
* Analyze complex functional and non\\-functional requirements (FR/NFR) and define comprehensive test strategies, plans, and objectives.
* Develop and maintain manual and automated test cases for web, API, and backend systems using tools like Selenium and Playwright.
* Perform end\\-to\\-end testing including Functional, Regression, Integration, System, UAT, and ensure data validation across SQL/Snowflake databases and stored procedures.
* Implement automation frameworks and integrate tests into CI/CD pipelines to improve efficiency and coverage
* Conduct API testing and performance/load testing using JMeter, analyzing results to optimize system scalability and stability.
* Test applications deployed on AWS/Azure environments, validating compatibility, scalability, and security in cloud\\-based architectures.
* Identify, document, and track defects using tools like Azure DevOps, and collaborate with development teams to resolve issues.
* Ensure compliance with QA standards, best practices, and security guidelines, maintaining clear documentation and reporting on test coverage and results.
* Mentor junior QA engineers, enforce best practices, and contribute to process improvements and test automation strategies.
* Troubleshoot complex system\\-level issues, drive root cause analysis, and recommend solutions for performance and reliability.
* Stay current with emerging QA tools, technologies, and methodologies, applying Agile principles to deliver continuous value and scalability.


 Job Requirements:
   

  

* Minimum 8‚Äì12 years of progressive experience in Software Quality Assurance for enterprise\\-scale applications, with at least 2\\+ years in a technical leadership or staff\\-level role.
* Advanced proficiency in Selenium and Playwright for automated UI and functional testing.
* Proven ability to design and implement automation frameworks and integrate them into CI/CD pipelines for large\\-scale systems.
* Deep experience in API testing using industry\\-standard tools and frameworks, ensuring robust coverage and reliability.
* Strong experience testing Angular and Aurelia applications, including complex UI workflows
* Expert\\-level knowledge of SQL, Snowflake, and stored procedures.
* Ability to validate data integrity, optimize queries, and troubleshoot backend data issues.
* Hands\\-on experience with AWS and Azure environments, including testing for scalability, security, and performance in cloud\\-based architectures.
* Proficiency in JMeter for performance and load testing, including analysis, bottleneck identification, and optimization strategies.
* Ability to analyze complex functional and non\\-functional requirements (FR/NFR) and define enterprise\\-level test strategies.
* Develop and maintain test plans, automation scripts, and quality metrics aligned with business objectives.
* In\\-depth experience in Functional, Regression, Integration, System, and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
* Strong ability to partner with engineering teams, product managers, architects, and DevOps to ensure quality across the SDLC.
* Proven track record of mentoring QA engineers, driving best practices, and influencing quality initiatives across teams.
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools, Agile methodologies, and modern QA best practices.
* Strong problem\\-solving, analytical skills, and ability to troubleshoot complex system\\-level issues.


**Education:**
* Bachelor's degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or Information Technology


**Physical Demands and Work Environment:**
* Sedentary work (i.e. sitting for long periods of time).
* Exerting up to 10 pounds of force occasionally and/or negligible amount of force.
* Subject to inside environmental conditions.
* Travel for this position will include less than 10% locally usually for training purposes.


*This position is not eligible for immigration sponsorship (e.g. H\\-1B, TN, or E\\-3\\). Applicants must be authorized to work in the United States as a condition of employment. (This is only applicable for US\\-based positions)*
*If you don‚Äôt meet every qualification listed but are excited about our mission and the work described, we encourage you to apply. Inovalon is most interested in finding the best candidate for the job, and you may be just the right person for this or other roles.*
*By embracing inclusion, we enhance our work environment and drive business success. Inovalon strives to provide equal opportunities to the communities where we operate and to our clients and everyone whom we serve. We endeavor to create a culture of inclusion in which our associates feel empowered to bring their full, authentic selves to work and pursue their professional goals in an equitable setting. We understand that by fostering this type of culture, and welcoming different perspectives, we generate innovation and growth.*
*Inovalon is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirement.*

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**About Us:** 
 Attentive.ai is a fast\\-growing vertical SaaS start\\-up, funded by Peak XV (Surge), InfoEdge, Vertex Ventures, and Tenacity Ventures \\& Insight Partners that provides innovative software solutions for the landscape, paving \\& construction industries in the United States. Our mission is to help businesses in this space improve their operations and grow their revenue through our simple \\& easy\\-to\\-use software platforms.
   

  

**Position Description**
 As a Senior Data Engineer at Attentive.ai, you will play a pivotal role in enabling data accessibility, migration, and intelligence across different products and teams. You will be responsible for building the entire architecture and processes for streamlining data migration for our Accelerate product. You will also be involved in defining the vision for collecting internal data for various business, product and engineering use cases.
   

  

 We expect you to be well balanced \\- super smart, quality and delivery focused with a high\\-level business acumen. You should be able to see nuances and intricacies that others might not.
   

  

**Roles \\& Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement solutions to migrate customers‚Äô existing data to Accelerate.

* Optimize and maintain data pipelines, ensuring high performance and scalability.

**Skills \\& Requirements**

* Proficiency in SQL and experience with data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing solutions.

**Why Work With Us**

* Enjoy a culture with opportunities for exponential growth and learning.
* Hybrid work atmosphere \\& flexible timing.

**Description**
 Job Title : Angular Engineer Online Shopping Experience
   

  

 Location : Hyderabad (Work from Office)

 Employment Type : Full\\-Time, Permanent
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As an Angular Engineer specializing in the Online Shopping Experience, you will be the lead architect of the customers journey. You will design and implement high\\-performance, scalable, and visually stunning user interfaces for our e\\-commerce platforms.
   

  

 Your goal is to transform complex shopping requirements into a seamless, "lightning\\-fast" storefront experience for millions of users across mobile and desktop.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Storefront Development : Implement complete user interfaces for modern e\\-commerce web applications using Angular (12\\+) and TypeScript.
* Checkout \\& Logic : Develop complex features such as dynamic shopping carts, multi\\-step checkout flows, and real\\-time inventory updates.
* Performance Engineering : Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability, focusing on Core Web Vitals (Lighthouse/PageSpeed) to ensure a smooth shopping experience.
* State Management : Manage complex data flows (product catalogs, user sessions, filters) using NgRx or Redux.
* API Integration : Work with backend teams to integrate RESTful services, payment gateways, and third\\-party APIs (Google, Facebook, etc.).
* SSR Implementation : Utilize Server\\-Side Rendering (SSR) and Angular Universal to enhance SEO and initial page load times for product pages.
* UI/UX Precision : Translate UI/UX design wireframes into high\\-quality code, ensuring "pixel\\-perfect" implementation and cross\\-browser compatibility.


**Mandatory Skill Requirements**
* Core Tech : Expert knowledge of Angular, TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3/SCSS.
* E\\-commerce Domain : Strong understanding of e\\-commerce architecture, including product listing pages (PLP), product detail pages (PDP), and conversion funnels.
* Frameworks : Hands\\-on experience with Angular Material and responsive design patterns.
* Optimization : Practical experience in page speed optimization and technical SEO.
* State \\& Logic : Proficiency in RxJS and reactive programming.
* Testing : Ability to write tested and documented code using Jasmine/Karma.


**Technical \\& Analytical Skills**
* Problem Solving : Quick at understanding complex logic and debugging existing codebases independently.
* Architecture : Ability to make critical design and technical decisions for Angular projects.
* Tools : Familiarity with JavaScript build tools like Grunt, Gulp, or Webpack and version control (Git).


**Behavioral Expectations**
* Ownership Mindset : You take accountability for the shopping experience end\\-to\\-end, from the first click to the final payment.
* Communication : Crisp in understanding business requirements and asking the right questions to ensure project alignment.
* Adaptability : Comfortable working in a fast\\-paced, delivery\\-oriented environment.


**Educational Qualifications**
 Bachelors/Masters degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

title: Development Engineer 3
description:
Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world's best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting\\-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. If you share in our passion for teamwork, our vision to revolutionize industries and our goal to lead the future in media and technology, we want you to fast\\-forward your career at Comcast.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 Responsible for planning and designing new software and web applications. Analyzes, tests and assists with the integration of new applications. Documents all development activity. Assists with training non\\-technical personnel. Has in\\-depth experience, knowledge and skills in own discipline. Usually determines own work priorities. Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
***Mandatory Skills : Java, Fullstack,Microservices,MQ,PostgreSQL,AWS***
 Full Stack Development experience in Java, Webservices, ReactJS, MySQL/PostgreSQL/any equivalent RDBMS, messaging frameworks (Kafka preferred/JMS/SQS/RabbitMQ), Cloud (AWS preferred).
   

  

 Functional Programming experience is a big plus.
   

  

**Experience In Clojure Highly Preferred.**
 Exposure to AI/ML desirable
   

  

**Core Responsibilities**
* Release Manager Roles and Responsibilities


 The Release Manager is responsible for the efficient and reliable delivery of software releases across the organization's diverse application portfolio, which includes multiple teams and technical stacks. They play a crucial role at the intersection of development, operations, and business, ensuring that software builds are created, tested, and deployed effectively.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Release Planning and Strategy:
* Collaborate with stakeholders to create and maintain a comprehensive release schedule, identifying dependencies, risks, and mitigation strategies.
* Understand the business context and technical details of each application to predict and address potential release issues.
* Coordinate with DevOps, SRE, and Infrastructure teams to align release artifacts, deployment pipelines, and environment changes.
* Version and Dependency Management:
* Maintain a centralized repository of application versions and dependencies, enforcing consistent versioning conventions.
* Ensure the compatibility of external system integrations and manage the impact of dependency updates.
* Release Packaging and Deployment:
* Work with development teams to package release artifacts (code, configs, migrations) for seamless deployment.
* Orchestrate the deployment of releases across environments, leveraging automation to move towards continuous delivery.
* Collaborate with SRE and Infrastructure teams to execute database migrations and infrastructure changes.
* Release Testing and Quality Assurance:
* Ensure comprehensive testing suites are in place and executed as part of the release process.
* Validate the integrity of release artifacts, including database migrations and infrastructure changes.
* Streamline the release validation process, working towards eliminating the need for manual "Go/No\\-Go" meetings.
* Scrum Ceremonies Management:
* Manage and run all Scrum ceremonies (Refinement, Planning, Daily Standup, and Retrospective) for the teams involved in the software release process.
* Ensure effective collaboration, communication, and alignment among development, operations, and business stakeholders during these ceremonies.
* Continuous Improvement:
* Conduct post\\-release reviews to identify areas for process optimization and automation.
* Implement lessons learned and industry best practices to enhance the release management function.
* Monitor technological trends and collaborate with teams to incorporate new tools and techniques.
* Communication and Stakeholder Management:
* Serve as the central point of contact for all release\\-related inquiries and concerns.
* Proactively communicate release status, risks, and mitigation strategies to development, operations, and business stakeholders.
* Maintain release\\-related documentation and ensure its availability to all teams.
* Enforcement of Policies and Procedures
* Approving source code changes‚Äîthis operation is managed through configuration files scattered throughout the codebase
* Specifying the actions to be performed during the release process
* Creating a new release
* Approving the initial integration proposal (which is a request to perform a build at a specific revision number in the source code repository) and subsequent cherry picks
* Deploying a new release
* Making changes to a project‚Äôs build configuration
* The Release Manager's technical expertise, business acumen, and collaborative approach, including their ability to manage Scrum ceremonies, are crucial in delivering software releases efficiently and reliably across the organization's diverse application portfolio.


**Employees At All Levels Are Expected To**
* Understand our Operating Principles; make them the guidelines for how you do your job.
* Own the customer experience \\- think and act in ways that put our customers first, give them seamless digital options at every touchpoint, and make them promoters of our products and services.
* Know your stuff \\- be enthusiastic learners, users and advocates of our game\\-changing technology, products and services, especially our digital tools and experiences.
* Win as a team \\- make big things happen by working together and being open to new ideas.
* Be an active part of the Net Promoter System \\- a way of working that brings more employee and customer feedback into the company \\- by joining huddles, making call backs and helping us elevate opportunities to do better for our customers.
* Drive results and growth.
* Support a culture of inclusion in how you work and lead.
* Do what's right for each other, our customers, investors and our communities.


**Disclaimer**
* This information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees in this role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications.


 \\#CIECTN25
   

  

 Comcast is an equal opportunity workplace. We will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis protected by applicable law.
   

  

 Base pay is one part of the Total Rewards that Comcast provides to compensate and recognize employees for their work. Most sales positions are eligible for a Commission under the terms of an applicable plan, while most non\\-sales positions are eligible for a Bonus. Additionally, Comcast provides best\\-in\\-class Benefits to eligible employees. We believe that benefits should connect you to the support you need when it matters most, and should help you care for those who matter most. That‚Äôs why we provide an array of options, expert guidance and always\\-on tools, that are personalized to meet the needs of your reality ‚Äì to help support you physically, financially and emotionally through the big milestones and in your everyday life. Please visit the compensation and benefits summary on our careers site for more details.
   

  

**Education**
 Bachelor's Degree
   

  

 While possessing the stated degree is preferred, Comcast also may consider applicants who hold some combination of coursework and experience, or who have extensive related professional experience.
   

  

**Relevant Work Experience**
 5\\-7 Years

title: Senior TIBCO Integration Specialist - VOIS
description:
**Who We Are**
 VOIS (Vodafone Intelligent Solutions) is a strategic arm of Vodafone Group Plc, creating value for customers by delivering intelligent solutions through Talent, Technology \\& Transformation.
   

  

 As the largest shared services organisation in the global telco industry with 30,000 FTE, our portfolio of next\\-generation solutions and services are designed in partnership with customers across Vodafone Group, local markets, and partner markets to simplify and drive growth. With our strategic partner Accenture, we work alongside our Vodafone customers, other Telco and tech companies to drive transformation, meet the challenges of our industry and ensure we stay relevant and resilient. This partnership is a unique, industry\\-first model which brings together the best of in\\-house and 3rd party capability.
   

  

 We work with customers across 28 countries from 10 VOIS locations: Albania, Egypt, Hungary, India, Romania, Spain, Turkey, UK, Germany, Ireland, and with a network of teams in Czech Republic, Italy, Greece, and Portugal.
   

  

 \\#VOIS \\#BeUnrivalled \\#CreateTheFuture
   

  

**About This Role**
 We are seeking a Senior TIBCO Integration Specialist to design and implement integration solutions using TIBCO BusinessWorks. The individual will work across the full development lifecycle, including analysis, design, coding, testing, and deployment, ensuring robust and scalable integration for Vodafone Czech Republic.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Collaborate with business analysts, architects, and developers across teams to deliver TIBCO integration solutions.
* Create technical designs and evaluate new or modified functionality to meet business and IT requirements.
* Develop and maintain code aligned with design specifications and best practices.
* Ensure governance on BusinessWorks coding standards and design principles.
* Perform unit testing and maintain documentation for delivered solutions.
* Provide third\\-level production support for bug fixes and enhancements.


**Who You Are**
* A natural team player with strong collaboration skills and the ability to work independently.
* Proficient in English (C1 level).
* Experienced in TIBCO BusinessWorks 5\\.x and TIBCO EMS.
* Skilled in enterprise integration patterns, REST APIs, XML, XSLT, XPath, and JSON.
* Knowledgeable in TIBCO BPM products, especially iProcess Engine.
* Advanced in SQL and Oracle PL/SQL, with familiarity in GitHub and UML.
* Exposure to DevOps principles and CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Kubernetes, ArgoCD, HELM Charts) is advantageous.
* Experience in the telecommunications sector and Java programming is a plus.
* Holds 7\\+ years of total experience, with at least 5\\+ years in a similar role.


**Not a Perfect Fit?**
 Concerned you may not meet every requirement? Vodafone is committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. If you are excited about this role but your experience does not align exactly with every aspect of the job description, you are encouraged to apply. You may be the right candidate for this or another opportunity, and the recruitment team will support you in exploring where your skills fit best.
   

  

**What‚Äôs In It For You**
 At Vodafone, we‚Äôre not just shaping the future of connectivity for our customers ‚Äì we‚Äôre shaping the future for everyone who joins our team. When you work with us, you‚Äôre part of a global mission to connect people, solve complex challenges, and create a sustainable and more inclusive world. If you want to grow your career whilst finding the perfect balance between work and life, Vodafone offers the opportunities to help you belong and make a real impact.
   

  

**What Skills You Will Learn**
* Advanced integration design and development using TIBCO tools.
* Hands\\-on experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
* Enhanced problem\\-solving and analytical skills in a dynamic telecom environment.


**VOIS Equal Opportunity Employer Commitment**
 Vodafone recognises and celebrates the value of diversity in building a workforce that reflects the customers and communities it serves. No form of discrimination is tolerated. This includes, but is not limited to, discrimination based on race, colour, age, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, maternity or parental status, ethnicity, disability, religion or belief, political affiliation, trade union membership, nationality, citizenship, indigenous status, medical condition, HIV status, neurodiversity, social origin, cultural background, marital or civil partnership status, or socio\\-economic background.
   

  

**Join Us**
 At Vodafone, we‚Äôre working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this.
   

  

 We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
   

  

 With us, you can truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.
   

  

**Alert**
 Apply for Vodafone jobs only through the official Vodafone Careers website to avoid job scams and fraud.

title: Collibra Developer
description:

title: SDE Intern(Python Flask django)
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Cehpoint is a forward\\-thinking IT and cybersecurity company delivering secure, scalable, and innovative technology solutions. Founded by ethical hackers and seasoned IT experts, Cehpoint offers services that include software development, cloud infrastructure, IT consulting, and cybersecurity tools like penetration testing and security compliance. Focused on innovation, reliability, and protection, Cehpoint ensures that technology not only functions efficiently but remains secure. Our mission is to empower businesses, from startups to enterprises, to achieve growth and safety in the digital age through tailored solutions.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a remote internship role for a Software Development Engineer (SDE) Intern specializing in Python with frameworks such as Flask and Django. The intern will be responsible for developing back\\-end web applications, writing clean and efficient code, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to design and implement features, and debugging and testing applications. The role involves applying programming and software development principles to create reliable and efficient solutions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong understanding of Computer Science fundamentals and concepts
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and building scalable web applications
* Proficiency in Software Development and Programming with a focus on Python, Flask, and Django
* Knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and practices
* Good problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work independently in a remote environment
* Strong teamwork and communication skills for collaboration
* Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
